subject: Baseball
Labor
Free Agents (Sports)
Wages and Salaries
lead_paragraph: It generally seems that a starting pitcher need only be able to lift his arm above his shoulder to get at least a three-year contract for $7 million a year. Not this year.
snippet: It generally seems that a starting pitcher need only be able to lift his arm above his shoulder to get at least a three-year contract for $7 million a year. Not this year.
